metadata.title: CVE-2019-16370 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The PGP signing plugin in Gradle before 6.0 relies on the SHA-1 algorithm, which might allow an attacker to replace an artifact with a different one that has the same SHA-1 message digest, a related issue to CVE-2005-4900.

criterions.comment: gradle package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
